TopicTitle: KSP install cannot get past loading screen

Articles.Content: So when I load my game something weird happens and it stays idle at the loading screen. I have no logs since the game did not crash. Should I provide a modlist and PC specs???

12 minutes ago, Kerbiter said:

So when I load my game something weird happens and it stays idle at the loading screen. I have no logs since the game did not crash. Should I provide a modlist and PC specs???

Yes you should.  And also an output_log.txt/player.log file (see the How to get support sticky thread for details of everything you should do).
